scripts.shell:db: docker-compose exec postgres psql -U postgres -d eda_computers
scripts.test:watch: docker-compose exec web npm run test:watch
scripts.lint: docker-compose exec web npm run lint
scripts.type-check: docker-compose exec web npm run type-check
scripts.seed: docker-compose exec server npm run seed
scripts.migrate: docker-compose exec server npm run migrate
scripts.migrate:reset: docker-compose exec server npm run migrate:reset
scripts.backup: docker-compose exec postgres pg_dump -U postgres eda_computers > backup_$(date +%Y%m%d_%H%M%S).sql
scripts.restore: echo 'Usage: docker-compose exec postgres psql -U postgres eda_computers < backup_file.sql'
scripts.setup: npm run build && npm run start && sleep 10 && npm run seed
scripts.reset: npm run clean && npm run setup
